name: RIG
description:
Take on the role of Rig, the poor soul who was drafted into the Federation Navy with the MOS of 74-X: "Spaceship Engineer."  The ship is under relentless assault, and its up to you to keep it afloat for as long as possible while staying alive in the process.

CONTROLS: 

'WASD': Move    'E': Repair   'LSHIFT': Slow to stop    'LEFTMOUSE': Shoot

Game created by Connor Robb ("SecretJuice1")

Music and Sounds edited by Anne Robb

Title Art by Anne Robb

Music by Kevin Maclaod

Some sounds from (https://www.zapsplat.com)

Some sounds from (http://www.freesfx.co.uk)
